comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.hrvh.org/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=/larc&CISO... for a picture of the "New York State Camp" at Peekskill, NY And about this time, the NYT reported on June 24, 1906 "TWELFTH REGIMENT IN CAMP.; Reaches Peekskill as the Twenty-third and Sixty-ninth Leave." query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9805E1DB1E3EE733A...
